mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_IMG, NEW_PRODUCT_IMG, UNIT_NAME, DELIVERY_PRICE, PRODUCT_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productContent}, #{productQuantity}, #{productImg}, #{newProductImg}, #{unitName}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{productType} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME productName, PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, DELIVERY_PRICE deliveryPrice, TO_CHAR(PRODUCT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as productDate, PRODUCT_IMG productImg, NEW_PRODUCT_IMG newProductImg FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PRODUCT_DATE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO productNo, PRODUCT_NAME productName, PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, PRODUCT_QUANTITY productQuantity, UNIT_NAME unitName, DELIVERY_PRICE deliveryPrice, TO_CHAR(PRODUCT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as productDate, PRODUCT_CONTENT productContent FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NO = #{ productNo }
